description:
Koester & Bradley, LLP, Wrongful Death Attorneys in Champaign-Urbana

A wrongful death is a death that shouldn't have happened or could have been prevented. The lawyers at Koester & Bradley, LLP, know this and have become champions for the survivors of people who have died because of negligence or wrongful conduct.

Koester & Breadly, LLP, based in Urbana, is one of Illinois' oldest law firms, dating back to 1895. We have been practicing wrongful death and serious injury law in central Illinois since the 1950s. Although we do not practice in a big city, we handle big-city cases. Our attorneys have recovered millions of dollars for our clients for deaths involving:

  • Motor vehicle wrecks, including ATVs
  • Semi trucks and tractor-trailers
  • Railroad crossings
  • Defective roadway design, manufacture or maintenance
  • Defect products and pharmaceuticals
  • Medical negligence

Our lawyers have received recognition from many organizations:

  • National Trial Lawyers, Top 40 Under 40
  • Leading Lawyers Network, Illinois' Top 100 Lawyers
  • Super Lawyers, 2007, 2008

Our office is at 136 West Main Street in downtown Urbana, just a block away from the Champaign County Circuit Court's clerk's office. All of our cases are contingency-based: you don't pay anything unless we win. Your first consultation with us is free. When someone you know has suffered a wrongful death or a serious injury, contact us.

Koester & Bradley, LLP. Justice for all people.
